text:
#===============#
| Tour creation |
#===============#

/tour create gen71v1, Elimination,, 2
/tour create gen71v1, Round Robin,, 2

#=============#
| Quick tours |
#=============#

/tour create 1v1, elimination, 8
/tour create 1v1, elimination, 16, 2
/tour autostart on

#==============================#
| For the Monthly Championship |
#==============================#
/tour create gen71v1, Elimination
/wall (Announcement)
.official


#==================#
| 1v1 Other Metas: |
#==================#

Information and Resources: http://www.smogon.com/forums/threads/1v1-deoxys-d-suspect-test.3587523/#post-7094827

     ------------
   ---Stabmons---
     ------------
/tour rules Stabmons Move Legality, -Tapu Koko, -Tapu Lele, -Spore
/tour name [Gen 7] Stabmons

     -----------
   ------AAA------
     -----------
/tour rules -Sturdy, -Huge Power, -Pure Power, -Fur Coat, -Illusion, -Moody, -Parental Bond, -Protean, -Simple, -Speed Boost, -Water Bubble, -Wonder Guard, -No Guard, -Imposter, -Normalize, -Psychic Surge, -Multiscale, -Shadow Shield, -Hustle, -Regigigas, -Slaking, -Kartana, -Pheromosa, -Archeops, Ignore Illegal Abilities
/tour name [Gen 7] Almost Any Ability 1v1

     ----------
   ------AG------
     ----------
/tour rules +Arceus, +Darkrai, +Deoxys, +Deoxys-Attack, +Deoxys-Defense, +Dialga, +Giratina, +Giratina-Origin, +Groudon, +Ho-Oh, +Kyogre, +Kyurem-White, +Lugia, +Lunala, +Kangaskhan-Mega, +Kangaskhanite, +Salamence-Mega, +Salamencite, +Marshadow, +Mewtwo, +Necrozma-Dusk-Mane, +Necrozma-Dawn-Wings, +Palkia, +Rayquaza, +Reshiram, +Shaymin-Sky, +Solgaleo, +Xerneas, +Yveltal, +Zekrom, +Focus Sash, +Perish Song, +Flash, +Kinesis, +Leaf Tornado, +Mirror Shot, +Mud Bomb, +Mud-Slap, +Muddy Water, +Night Daze, +Octazooka, +Sand Attack, +Smokescreen, !Evasion Moves Clause, !Species Clause, !OHKO Clause, !Nickname Clause
/tour name [Gen 7] 1v1 Anything Goes

     ----------
   ------UU------  Updated 14-12-2017
     ----------
/tour rules -Aegislash, -Alakazam-Mega, -Blaziken-Mega, -Charizard-Mega-X, -Charizard-Mega-Y, -Donphan, -Dragonite, -Greninja, -Gyarados-Mega, -Kyurem-Black, -Landorus-Therian, -Lopunny-Mega, -Mawile-Mega, -Metagross-Mega, -Mimikyu, -Porygon-Z, -Tapu Koko, -Tapu Lele, -Venusaur-Mega, -Alakazite, -Blazikenite, -Charizardite X, -Charizardite Y, -Gyaradosite, -Lopunnite, -Mawilite, -Metagrossite, -Venusaurite 
/tour name [Gen 7] 1v1 UnderUsed

     ----------
   ---Monotype---
     ----------
/tour rules Same Type Clause, -Metagrossite
/tour name [Gen 7] 1v1 Monotype

     ---------
   -----2v2-----
     ---------
/tour create 2v2, Elimination

     ----------
   -----ORAS-----
     ----------
/tour create gen6ubers, elimination
/tour rules -Arceus, -Blaziken, -Darkrai, -Deoxys-Attack, -Deoxys-Base, -Dialga, -Giratina, -Giratina-Origin, -Groudon, -Ho-Oh, -Kyogre, -Kyurem-White, -Lugia, -Mewtwo, -Palkia, -Rayquaza, -Reshiram, -Shaymin-Sky, -Xerneas, -Yveltal, -Zekrom, -Focus Sash, -Kangaskhanite, -Salamencite, -Soul Dew, -Perish Song, !Species Clause
/tour name [Gen 6] 1v1


--------------------------#===========#--------------------------
--------------------------# Changelog #--------------------------
--------------------------#===========#--------------------------

#============# 
# 17/12/2017 # - Updated Christmas banlist to ban every mon not allowed
#============#

#============# 
# 14/12/2017 # - Huge update
#============#

#============# 
# 22/09/2017 # - Banned Electrify from Sketch
#============# - Unbanned Dugtrio, Genesect and Dragonite from AAA
               - Changed UU 1v1 to 1v1 UU

#============# 
# 24/09/2017 # - Added Deoxys-Base to gen6 banlist
#============#

#============# 
# 20/10/2017 # - Update UU banlist
#============# - Unbanned Marshadow from AG

#============# 
# 20/10/2017 # - Unbanned Necrozma formes in ag
#============# - Fixed the oddities in the instructions for officials
               - Fixed naming inconsistancies
               - Fixed Sketchmons->Stabmons and removed christmas
